thread.title: BBC's The Chimp Smuggler expose torture of baby chimps
thread.title_full: BBC's The Chimp Smuggler expose torture of baby chimps

title: BBC's The Chimp Smuggler expose torture of baby chimps
text: show ad Torn from their mothers' arms as their families are slaughtered - then sold as the playthings of the rich. Now an undercover investigation exposed the torture of the baby chimps In a carefully planned sting, a journalist posing as a broker approached a gang in Abidjan on the Ivory Coast with an offer to buy an infant chimpanzee The journalist says that his wealthy client lives in the Gulf states But as the head of the traffickers, corrupt businessman Ibrahima Traore, prepares to hand over the animal, police burst in Traore makes a break for it, but is captured and dragged back to the compound As police search for the captive baby, they uncovered a hub of exotic pet trade The 12-month operation followed a trail across half a dozen countries that led to the backstreets of the Ivory Coast's largest city, Abidjan Published: 22:55 GMT, 31 January 2017 | Updated: 12:02 GMT, 1 February 2017 104 shares
